headings.usage: All section titles, page headers, and modal titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Data tables, form inputs, long-form text. Use relaxed line-height (1.6).

containers.card: bg-white border border-border rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-lg font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-lg font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent/10 hover:text-accent h-10 px-4 rounded-lg font-medium

inputs.default: h-11 bg-white border-border focus:border-accent focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent/20 rounded-lg transition-all

cards.stat: flex flex-col p-6 bg-white border border-border rounded-xl shadow-sm
cards.profile: flex flex-col items-center p-8 bg-white border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:border-accent/50 transition-colors

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' theme: White backgrounds, stark black/slate text, and purposeful blue accents.
Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all headings to give a modern, academic feel. Use 'Inter' for data-heavy tables.
For the Student Dashboard, use the 'Tetris Grid' layout: A large welcome block, followed by smaller status and action blocks.
For the Admin Dashboard, use the 'Control Room' layout: Dense data tables with clear hierarchy and filters.
Ensure all forms use the 'Generous Spacing' rule: p-8 padding inside containers, gap-6 between fields.
Use Shadcn components for all interactive elements (Dialogs, Dropdowns, Datepickers) but style them to match the 'Swiss' aesthetic (square corners or small radii, minimal shadows).
Implement the 'Tracing Beam' effect on the Photo Upload dropzone to make it feel active and engaging.
Ensure the 'Login' page uses the provided architectural background image with a glassmorphism overlay for the form.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements for testing.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'Bootstrap' layouts. Use asymmetry and varied column spans.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate 900 (#0F172A) instead.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
Ensure mobile responsiveness for all layouts (stack columns on small screens).
